root.name: Wild West C.O.W.-Boys of Moo Mesa
root.description: OverviewWild West C.O.W.-Boys of Moo Mesa is a side scrolling beat 'em up/shooter developed and published by Konami for the arcade platform.TriviaC.O.W.-Boys was created by Mirage Studios scribe Ryan Brown, who is responsible for the creation of Leatherhead, among many other popular Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles characters and stories. in the late 2000's, the C.O.W.-Boys crossed over with the TMNT a few times (though sadly never in a video game capacity, as Miyamoto Usagi had done before).
